The clock is used to measure time.
A clock is a device used to measure and indicate time.
The item is a clock, which measures time.
A clock is an instrument used to measure and indicate time.
A clock measures time, usually in hours, minutes, and seconds.
A clock is a device used to measure and keep track of time. It is typically used to measure the passage of time in hours, minutes, and seconds.

A clock is a device used to measure and indicate time. Clocks typically measure time using units of seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, and years. Clocks can also be used to indicate the current time or time elapsed since a particular point in the past.
